import React from 'react'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; const CertificateTemplate = ({ certificateData = {} }) => { const { name = "Student Name", event = "Event Name", type = "Participation", organizer = "College Name", date = new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }), certificateId = `CERT-${Date.now()}-${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000)}`, signature = "Principal", signatureTitle = "Head of Institution" } = certificateData; // Generate QR Code data const qrData = JSON.stringify({ certificateId: certificateId, name: name, event: event, type: type, date: date, organizer: organizer, verifyUrl: `${window.location.origin}/verify/${certificateId}` }); // Color based on certificate type const getColorByType = (type) => { const typeLower = type.toLowerCase(); if (typeLower.includes('winner') || typeLower.includes('first')) { return { primary: '#FFD700', secondary: '#D4AF37' }; // Gold } if (typeLower.includes('second')) { return { primary: '#C0C0C0', secondary: '#A8A8A8' }; // Silver } if (typeLower.includes('third')) { return { primary: '#CD7F32', secondary: '#A97142' }; // Bronze } return { primary: '#3498db', secondary: '#2980b9' }; // Blue for participation }; const colors = getColorByType(type); return (
{/* Background Pattern */}
{/* Decorative Corners */}
{/* Main Certificate */}
{/* Header with Gold Border */}
{/* Certificate Header */}
üèÜ

CERTIFICATE OF EXCELLENCE

OFFICIAL DIGITAL CERTIFICATE

{/* Certificate Body */}
{/* Watermark */}
ACHIEVEMENT
{/* Certificate Text */}

This is to certify that

{name}

has been awarded the {type.toUpperCase()} for outstanding performance in

"{event}"

organized by {organizer}

{/* Details Section */}
Certificate ID: {certificateId}
Issued On: {date}
Category: {type}
Status: ‚úÖ VERIFIED
{/* QR Code and Signature */}

{signature}

{signatureTitle}

Scan to Verify Authenticity

{certificateId}

{/* Footer */}
üèõÔ∏è Official Digital Certificate
üîí Secured with Blockchain Technology
üåê Globally Verifiable
); }; const styles = { container: { width: '900px', minHeight: '650px', margin: '30px auto', position: 'relative', fontFamily: "'Playfair Display', 'Georgia', serif", background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)', padding: '30px', borderRadius: '20px', boxShadow: '0 25px 70px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)' }, backgroundPattern: { position: 'absolute', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundImage: ` radial-gradient(circle at 25px 25px, rgba(255,255,255,0.2) 2%, transparent 2.5%), radial-gradient(circle at 75px 75px, rgba(255,255,255,0.2) 2%, transparent 2.5%) `, backgroundSize: '100px 100px', opacity: 0.3, zIndex: 0 }, cornerTL: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', left: '20px', width: '40px', height: '40px', borderTop: '3px solid #FFD700', borderLeft: '3px solid #FFD700', zIndex: 2 }, cornerTR: { position: 'absolute', top: '20px', right: '20px', width: '40px', height: '40px', borderTop: '3px solid #FFD700', borderRight: '3px solid #FFD700', zIndex: 2 }, cornerBL: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '20px', left: '20px', width: '40px', height: '40px', borderBottom: '3px solid #FFD700', borderLeft: '3px solid #FFD700', zIndex: 2 }, cornerBR: { position: 'absolute', bottom: '20px', right: '20px', width: '40px', height: '40px', borderBottom: '3px solid #FFD700', borderRight: '3px solid #FFD700', zIndex: 2 }, certificate: { backgroundColor: '#fff', borderRadius: '15px', overflow: 'hidden', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1, boxShadow: '0 10px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)' }, headerBorder: { height: '8px', background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, #FFD700, #D4AF37, #FFD700)', width: '100%' }, header: { background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1a2980 0%, #26d0ce 100%)', padding: '40px 30px', textAlign: 'center', position: 'relative', color: 'white' }, badge: { position: 'absolute', top: '-25px', left: '50%', transform: 'translateX(-50%)', width: '80px', height: '80px', background: 'radial-gradient(circle, #FFD700, #D4AF37)', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', fontSize: '40px', border: '5px solid white', boxShadow: '0 5px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)' }, mainTitle: { fontSize: '3em', margin: '20px 0 10px', fontWeight: 'bold', letterSpacing: '2px', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)' }, subTitle: { fontSize: '1.1em', opacity: 0.9, letterSpacing: '3px', margin: 0 }, body: { padding: '50px 60px', position: 'relative', minHeight: '500px', background: 'url("https://www.transparenttextures.com/patterns/cream-paper.png")' }, watermark: { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(-45deg)', fontSize: '140px', color: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.03)', fontWeight: 'bold', zIndex: 0, whiteSpace: 'nowrap', fontFamily: "'Montserrat', sans-serif" }, textSection: { position: 'relative', zIndex: 1, textAlign: 'center' }, introText: { fontSize: '1.4em', color: '#555', marginBottom: '30px' }, nameSection: { margin: '30px 0' }, name: { fontSize: '3.8em', color: '#1a2980', margin: 0, fontFamily: "'Great Vibes', cursive", fontWeight: 'normal', background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, #1a2980, #26d0ce)', WebkitBackgroundClip: 'text', WebkitTextFillColor: 'transparent', textShadow: '2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)' }, nameUnderline: { width: '300px', height: '3px', background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #FFD700, transparent)', margin: '10px auto' }, midText: { fontSize: '1.3em', color: '#666', margin: '30px 0', lineHeight: '1.6' }, typeBadge: { display: 'inline-block', padding: '8px 25px', margin: '0 10px', color: 'white', fontSize: '1.2em', fontWeight: 'bold', borderRadius: '25px', verticalAlign: 'middle', boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)' }, eventSection: { margin: '30px 0' }, event: { fontSize: '2.2em', color: '#2c3e50', margin: 0, fontStyle: 'italic', fontWeight: 'bold', display: 'inline-block', padding: '15px 30px', borderLeft: '5px solid #FFD700', borderRight: '5px solid #FFD700', background: 'linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,215,0,0.1), rgba(255,215,0,0.1))' }, organizerText: { fontSize: '1.2em', color: '#3498db', marginTop: '20px' }, detailsSection: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.08)', border: '2px dashed rgba(52, 152, 219, 0.5)', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '25px', margin: '40px 0', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, detailGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(2, 1fr)', gap: '20px' }, detailItem: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', padding: '12px 0', borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1)' }, detailLabel: { fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#2c3e50', fontSize: '1em' }, detailValue: { color: '#e74c3c', fontFamily: "'Courier New', monospace", fontSize: '1em', fontWeight: 'bold' }, detailValid: { color: '#27ae60', fontWeight: 'bold', backgroundColor: 'rgba(39, 174, 96, 0.1)', padding: '5px 15px', borderRadius: '15px' }, bottomSection: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'flex-end', marginTop: '40px', position: 'relative', zIndex: 1 }, signatureSection: { textAlign: 'center', flex: 1 }, signatureLine: { width: '250px', height: '1px', backgroundColor: '#000', margin: '0 auto 10px' }, signatureName: { fontSize: '1.3em', fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#2c3e50', margin: '5px 0' }, signatureTitle: { color: '#7f8c8d', fontSize: '1em', margin: 0 }, qrSection: { textAlign: 'center' }, qrContainer: { backgroundColor: 'white', padding: '20px', borderRadius: '12px', border: '2px solid #3498db', boxShadow: '0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)', minWidth: '200px' }, qrText: { fontSize: '0.9em', color: '#666', marginTop: '12px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, qrId: { fontSize: '0.8em', color: '#e74c3c', fontFamily: "'Courier New', monospace", marginTop: '8px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, footer: { backgroundColor: '#2c3e50', color: 'white', padding: '20px', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-around', alignItems: 'center' }, footerItems: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '10px', fontSize: '1em' }, footerIcon: { fontSize: '1.2em' } }; export default CertificateTemplate;
